name: ‘Fatherhood is an adventure that somehow both constrains and expands your world’: What having a daughter has taught me about being a man
body:
"

I stood at the end of the bed with one of my partner’s feet braced against my chest. We had made a careful plan, but failed to consult the baby about to be
title: ‘Fatherhood is an adventure that somehow both constrains and expands your world’: What having a daughter has taught me about being a man
abstract: Fatherhood is a deep pool to swim in, and it is an adventure that feels boundless and rewarding; that somehow both constrains and expands your world.It is the most meaningful thing I have ever done. We are old parents, at the edge of our fertility, who have barely made it to a home and a baby.

name: Got a new tattoo? Here's what to do (and what not to)
body:
"

If you've just been inked, you probably can't take your eyes off your new body art - unless it's, say, somewhere on your back. But you should also pay close attention to it
title: Got a new tattoo? Here's what to do (and what not to)
abstract: To prevent this, you should keep the skin somewhat moist by carefully applying a mild, gentle moisturizer or ointment.It's important to treat the tattoo as hygienically as possible. Before touching it, you should at least wash your hands - and better yet, disinfect them.

name: How to prepare for your first tattoo appointment
body:
"

You've decided on a design and made an appointment with a tattoo artist. There's a good possibility that, along with excited anticipation, you have butterflies in your stom
title: How to prepare for your first tattoo appointment
abstract: If you're supposed to take a blood thinner, you should consult your doctor before the tattoo appointment.Wash the skin - but nothing more. Extra skin care, for example by applying lotion or a mildly anaesthetic cream, isn't a good idea.

title: Doctor Reveals Why You Have to Poop Right After Eating—And What to Do About It

title: This 'Forgotten' Blood Test Can Catch Cancer Early

Miller, MD, RD, an internal medicine doctor and registered dietitian at Foxhall Internists.Dr. Miller says that while a CBC test cannot diagnose cancer on its own, it can reveal early signs of certain types of cancer, including leukemia and lymphoma, which often cause abnormal increases or decreases in blood cell counts.

name: Cow Teeth: Do Cows Have Upper Teeth?
body:

Cows have been domesticated for over 10,000 years. They’re cloven-hooved herbivores of the Bovidae family. We use them f
title: Cow Teeth: Do Cows Have Upper Teeth?
abstract: Cows do have upper teeth; however, they only have incisors on their lower jaw. Let’s dive into why this is the case. The reason for this is simple: cows are ruminants (like sheep and goats), and ruminants grow a hard, fleshy mound called a dental pad in place of upper incisors.

name: How to Recognize Signs of Illness in Pet Birds

title: How to Recognize Signs of Illness in Pet Birds
abstract: Watch for signs like open-mouthed breathing or panting, especially when the bird is at rest. Other warning signs include tail bobbing in rhythm with their breaths, wheezing or clicking sounds, and nasal discharge. These symptoms often indicate respiratory infections, which can escalate quickly if untreated.

name: Is It Safe To Leave Car Batteries On The Charger Overnight?
body:
"

We have gotten into a habit of charging our electronic devices at night. Because we cannot use these things when we are asleep, this is when we charge our smartphones, smart
title: Is It Safe To Leave Car Batteries On The Charger Overnight?
abstract: Another issue with overnight charging is that it can be problematic if you don't have a charger that automatically turns off once your battery is fully charged. Having continuous power flow to a charged battery will weaken the battery's ability to hold a charge in the long run.

title: The Next Big Thing in Luxury Travel: A Family Therapist
abstract: For about $80,000 (not including airfare), families can get all of the usual benefits of a far-flung trip, from delicious meals to adventurous outdoor activities, plus a professional therapist on hand.Madeline Avery, 35, went on a five-night retreat in October 2024 with her husband, Jack, and their children, who are 8 and 5 years old.

name: Next Social Security payment arrives on June 18
body:
"

The Social Security Administration (SSA) has prepared to disburse the third payment of the month on June 18. This payment is crucial for many, as it suppor
title: Next Social Security payment arrives on June 18
abstract: The Social Security Administration (SSA) has prepared to disburse the third payment of the month on June 18. This payment is crucial for many, as it supports individuals born between the 11th and 20th of any month. Additionally, those enrolled in the Supplemental Security Income (SSI) program will also receive their benefits on this date.

name: Massive fire erupts at Tehran oil depot after Israel strike caught on video
body:
"

A shocking video has gone viral, showing a massive blaze engulfing the Shahran Oil Depot in Tehran.

Reports from
title: Massive fire erupts at Tehran oil depot after Israel strike caught on video
abstract: The death toll from the Iranian ballistic missile strike in Tamra, northern Israel, has risen to three, according to first responders on the scene. This tragic incident brings the total number of Israeli casualties to seven. On the other hand, Iranian media outlets are reporting nearly 80 deaths and approximately 300 injuries.

name: Why You Should Always Use A Credit Card When Buying Refurbished Tech
body:
"

Whether you're looking to save money or want to do your part to reduce environmental waste, buying refurbished tech can be a great way to get the devices you need while reduc
title: Why You Should Always Use A Credit Card When Buying Refurbished Tech
abstract: One of the biggest credit card perks is extended warranty coverage, something that can make a big difference when you buy refurbished tech. Major credit card companies like American Express, Chase, and Capital One automatically extend the manufacturer's warranty by 12-24 months, often covering up to $10,000 per item.

name: Social Security can pay you up to 124% if you follow the right steps
body:
"

Millions of Americans depend on Social Security benefits to sustain their retirement lifestyle. Understanding how to maximize these benefits is essential f
title: Social Security can pay you up to 124% if you follow the right steps
abstract: However, with proper planning, Social Security can pay you up to 124% of your full benefit. The key to increasing your Social Security payments lies in delaying your benefit claims. Your full retirement age (FRA) is when you qualify for your base monthly benefit, known as the Primary Insurance Amount (PIA).

title: Statistics Say: This Is the Best Age to Claim Social Security

title: I’m 62, ready to retire and need to know how much I'll be taxed on capital gains when I cash in my nest egg
abstract: If you're married and file jointly with an annual retirement income of $240,000, you’ll pay a 24% tax rate on short-term capital gains but almost 10% less (15%) tax on long-term capital gains. This tax advantage may be one reason to start withdrawing long-term capital gains as retirement income before you claim Social Security.

title: These homes cost less than $200,000. Boise plans to make room for more of them

The US doll
title: Iranian rial plunges 12% against major currencies amid Israeli strikes
abstract: By bnm Tehran bureau Iran's currency collapsed against major international currencies on June 15, with the rial losing over 12% of its value as military exchanges with Israel intensified and nuclear negotiations were cancelled. The US dollar surged to IRR947,000, representing a 12.67% depreciation for the rial in a single trading session.

title: Fairfax plant to get $4 billion investment, start production on another vehicle

The Fairfax plant will help produce the gas-powered Chevrolet Equinox starting in mid-2027.

body:

Key Points
title: How often should you meet with a financial advisor?

The frequency at which you meet with your financial advisor should depend on your needs and the work your advisor is doing for you.

GOP lawmakers and the mortgage industry are raising questions about the Trump administration's plans to maintain government control over much of the nation's housing finance system, defying expectations that it would back off.

President Donald
title: Trump has a plan to remake the housing-finance system. It's baffling to many lawmakers and experts.
abstract: President Donald Trump surprised the industry late last month by pledging to take public Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, the government-controlled companies that stand behind half the $16 trillion residential mortgage market — while preserving an implicit federal guarantee for their solvency.

name: A record number of people are claiming Social Security — but what’s really the best age to start?
body:
"

Elon Musk may have made a recent dramatic exit from DOGE, but the im
title: A record number of people are claiming Social Security — but what’s really the best age to start?
abstract: But claiming early — even by one year — comes with a downside: Though you’re eligible to claim Social Security benefits as early as 62, you get an 8% increase in benefits for every year you wait, up to age 70, when the maximum benefit kicks in. The maximum monthly benefit if you start claiming at age 62 in 2025 is $2,831.

name: July Social Security direct payment worth $967 goes out in 16 days
body:
"

July’s Supplemental Security Income payment, worth up to $967, will go ou
title: July Social Security direct payment worth $967 goes out in 16 days
abstract: July’s Supplemental Security Income payment, worth up to $967, will go out to millions of beneficiaries in 16 days. The next payments are scheduled to be distributed on July 1. These payments are given to people living with debilitating disabilities that affect their income, according to the Social Security Administration.

My mom gifted it to me for a big birthday after carefully hunting for the perfect piece in the secondary market.

<

name: Boosting Your Social Security: 2 Often-Overlooked Rules That Increase Benefits Over 70%
body:
"

It's almost impossible for most Americans to properly plan for retirement without considering Social Security. It's a social program that has been around for decades and has kept millions of Americans financially afloat during their retirement years.</
title: Boosting Your Social Security: 2 Often-Overlooked Rules That Increase Benefits Over 70%
abstract: Claiming spousal benefits before your FRA reduces them by 25/36 of 1% monthly, up to 36 months. Each additional month further reduces them by 5/12 of 1%. In either case, leaning on spousal benefits could noticeably increase the monthly benefit of a spouse in particular situations.

title: What are stablecoins?
abstract: Stablecoins are a type of digital token or cryptocurrency whose value is pegged one-for-one to an actual asset, such as fiat money or gold, in order to maintain a stable price. Stablecoins thus are different from other popular cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin (BTC-USD) whose values are highly volatile and fluctuate based on supply and demand.

title: Happy Father’s Day to these Trump family dads: Who’s who in the paternal family tree?

name: Liverpool plot ‘£100m shock move’ to sign Newcastle United star as PL rivals line up replacement
body:
"

Liverpool are reportedly considering a ‘shock £100m move’ for a Newcastle United star and their Premier League rivals have a replacement lined up.
title: Liverpool plot ‘£100m shock move’ to sign Newcastle United star as PL rivals line up replacement
abstract: A cash-plus-player deal was discussed, with Joe Gomez mentioned as a potential candidate to go in the other direction, but the move fell through after Newcastle opted to sell Yankuba Minteh and Elliott Anderson instead. 24-year-old Gordon continued his great form for the Magpies in 2024/25, grabbing six goals and five assists in the Premier League.

name: Former Kansas Tight End Fairchild wins UFL Championship with DC Defenders
body:
"

Kansas football alums Mason Fairchild and Bryce Torneden played together for one season in Lawrence back in 2019, but on Saturday the two squared off against each o
title: Former Kansas Tight End Fairchild wins UFL Championship with DC Defenders
abstract: Torneden's Michigan Panthers got the best of Fairchild's DC Defenders in the regular season, winning 38-14 back in Week 6, but that wasn't the case in the UFL Championship on Saturday. The Defenders obliterated the Panthers, 58-34, in a game that was all but decided before halftime.
